A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The good guys are now stunning\, slapping and treating each other like enemies. Luke was willing to burn books (like the Nazis!?!) that he ... didn't even read?
Star Wars used to have a wholesome and positive message about the value of friendship\, dedication and assiduous practice among other things.
Very little in this movie makes sense.
This is the third time I have tried to post a review.
